track.name: Everything's Just Wonderful
comments: I've always laughed at other chicks in Rock who are Lily Allen haters, and say really awful things about her (unless you think calling her a "chick with a dick" is supposed to be a compliment).  I mean, just HOW JEALOUS does one have to be in order to put down another artist like that, just because people like her music way more than yours.  I know none of the chicks in the group who said it are likely to read this, but this is an awesome song, and better than anything YOU'VE ever put out... it's that simple.
I don't know what to shout, 'cuz I loved every single word in this song [2] lol so true.

Do you think, everything, everyone, is going mental,
It seems to me that it's spiraling outta control and it's inevitable,
Now don't you think,
This time is yours, this time is mine,
did u know everything is just wounderfull
I still don't understand WHY this wasn't a single... :(
nice song cool lyrics im gonna attempt to sing this song
